experience.title: Web Designer & Developer
experience.description: Design and development of websites and SaaS platforms for clients of all sizes. I specialize in building small, lightweight and responsive websites, online shops and blogs, and complex and flexible WordPress installations, including theme, widget and plugin development.

experience.title: Director of Product Design
experience.description: I coached and mentored a team of designers, collaborated with engineers, product managers, sales and support, and acted as voice of the customer. As a detail-oriented leader, I enjoyed building cross-functional relationships with stakeholders and finding innovative solutions to challenging problems.
highlights: Led customer discovery, backlog management and prioritization
Developed team processes to validate, build and test solutions.
Product manager for Pathways, a new feature which doubled engagement time and tripled user retention. Pathways was nominated for Product of the Year 2024 by Technical.ly Baltimore.
Led effort to create a new visual identity for our brand and website.

experience.title: Design Engineer
experience.description: First UI/UX hire, responsible for developing UX design and UX research processes, and redesigning the EcoMap platform to optimize for usability and meeting user needs.
highlights: Modernized app UI for the EcoMap platform, improving usability and trust.
Design and front-end development for our AI-powered Ecosystem Chatbot

experience.company: FIFCO USA (Genesee Beer, Labatt USA & Seagram's Escapes)
experience.title: Web Designer & Developer
experience.description: Lead designer and developer for a suite of brand and corporate websites. Rapidly designing, prototyping, building, testing, and launching multiple web-based projects concurrently. Managing team project backlog, task assignment and prioritization.
highlights: Design and develop a company intranet site, as well design intranet policies and training materials
Design and front end development of an online conference and video hosting portal for use by our sales team
Design and development for a holiday marketplace featuring black-owned businesses, that increased site traffic by 20%.
Design and development for the #GeneSEENY web app, featuring seasonal outdoor activities and Genesee vendors. Written in JavaScript using Mapbox GL framework and a product data API.

Facilitate customer discovery sessions, design workshops, & lean experiments

User research, competitive analysis and opportunity mapping for new products
